name: kaleidoscope
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] a toy in the shape of a tube, that you look through to see different patterns of light made by pieces of coloured glass and mirrors
Philippe Regard/Photodisc/GettyImages
[ S ] a changing and enjoyable mixture or pattern: The street bazaar was a kaleidoscope of colours, smells, and sounds.
